name: raucousness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being loud and energetic: His songs mix sophisticated songwriting with bar-room raucousness. The crowd's appreciative raucousness increased with their alcohol consumption. See
raucous
More examplesFewer examplesLocal residents complained about the raucousness of fans.I loved the raucousness of my grandma's house.It's a vibrant city with some disorder and raucousness at night.The fourth movement highlighted a natural raucousness to the orchestra's sound.
